description: Been using this torrent client for years. The best there is.
BiglyBT has many advanced feature and is very reliable client

I have no idea how I never came across this app sooner (dang, it's 2023 and this app was created in 2003!). In any case, I installed it and was blown away. Everything about its design is remarkable, and thoroughly thought out. I also love the choices during installation for beginner, intermediate and advanced users.

Although any bittorrent app will "do the job", this one works so nicely on every level. The interface is so well laid out and easy to navigate. In term of function and speed, it's great... and I'm using it on an ancient HP tower computer. I had to install another copy of this app onto my new Lenovo laptop too! Job well done guys!
summary: The pinnacle of bittorrent software IMO

description:
If you ever find another BT client with more features, let me know

I like the integration with I2P the most tbh
